messages.details:
This issue could expose your device to attack and loss of data.

Turn on the firewall for at least one product listed below:

  • Cyberoam
  • Windows Firewall

Click INSTRUCTIONS to learn how to enable your firewall.
messages.summary: The firewall on your device is turned off.

messages.details:
Your device has threat(s) found by your local anti-malware that cannot be automatically removed.

  • Threat Name: TrojanTool

    Path: C:\PROGRAM FILES (X86)\NKT_BROWSERINC

    Detected by: ESET Endpoint Antivirus

    Number of times detected: 3

    Last action taken: Threat was moved to quarantine zone.

Your organization's private data is at risk. Disconnect your device from the network immediately and contact your Administrator.
messages.summary: Threat(s) have been found by your local anti-malware products.
